actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to extend the Solid Waste Disposal Act, as amended, and the Clean Air Act, as amended, for 1 year.

summary.text: Extends the Solid Waste Disposal Act, as amended, for one year. Extends the Clean Air Act, as amended, for one year. Authorizes appropriations for such extensions.

titles.title: A bill to extend the Solid Waste Disposal Act, as amended, and the Clean Air Act, as amended, for 1 year.
